mapper.update: update materiel_stock set warehousing_id = #{warehousingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, materiel_id = #{materielId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, note_taker = #{noteTaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_time = #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, warehousing_id, materiel_id, number, note_taker, record_time from materiel_stock
